column4: Hey, I hate to analogize to windows, but what area do you guys treat as your "program files"? Where do you install your things to? Google earth wants to install to home/usr (I think thats the right representation, where user is your username). Is that a decent place to install to?
but to be fair tritium, isnt the universe > ALL of us?
that's a command for ubotu to give info to alitis4 ;)
